Verses: 2 karththar Yaakkobin Vaasasthalangal Ellaavatraippaarkkilum Seeyonin Vaasalgalil Piriyamaayirukkiraar.
3 dhevanudaiya Nagarame! Unnaik Kuriththu Magimaiyaana Viseshangal Vasanikkappadum. (selaa.)
4 ennai Arindhavargalukkulle Raagaabaiyum Baabilonaiyum Kuriththup Pesuven; Idho, Pelisthiyarilum, Theeriyarilum, Eththiyoppiyarilunkooda, Innaan Ange Pirandhaan Endrum;
5 seeyonaikkuriththu, Innaan Innaan Adhile Pirandhaanendrum Sollappadum; Unnadhamaanavarthaame Adhai Sthirappaduththuvaar.
6 karththar Janangalaip Perezhudhumpodhu, Innaan Adhile Pirandhaan Endru Avargalaith Thogaiyiduvaar. (selaa.)
7 engal Ootrugalellaam Unnil Irukkiradhu Endru Paaduvaarum Aaduvaarum Egamaaich Solluvaargal.
